TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Domain extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition

Docs.summary: The class represents an Active Directory domain.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Children As DomainCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the domains that are children of this domain.
Docs.exception: The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetDomainName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetDomainName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetDomainName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

Docs.param: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.
One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.
The password for the trust.
Docs.summary: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會建立信任關係的一方。 在建立雙方的信任之前，不會建立信任。
`trustPassword`建立信任與參數產生關聯的密碼。 建立信任的另一端時，提供相同的密碼，然後互相繫結兩個本機信任。
若要以程式設計方式建立信任關係的兩端單一方法呼叫中，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

Docs.exception: The trust relationship already exists.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
or is empty.
or is .
is not a valid value.
The object has been disposed.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CreateTrustRelationship(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain targetDomain, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction) cil managed
Public Sub CreateTrustRelationship (targetDomain As Domain, direction As TrustDirection)

Docs.param: A object that represents the domain that the trust is being created with.
One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.
Docs.summary: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立信任關係的兩端具有單一方法呼叫。 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法用來建立信任關係的單面。

Docs.exception: The trust relationship already exists.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
is .
is not a valid value.
The object has been disposed.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName) cil managed

Docs.param: The DNS name of the domain that the trust exists with.
Docs.summary: Deletes the local side of a trust relationship.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 刪除信任關係的一方時，較長的信任存在。
若要刪除一個方法呼叫的信任關係的兩端，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

Docs.exception: There is no trust relationship with the that is specified by the parameter.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
is an empty string.
is .
The object has been disposed.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Docs.param: A object that represents the domain that the trust exists with.
Docs.summary: Deletes both sides of a trust relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要刪除的信任關係的只有一個側邊，請使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.DeleteLocalSideOfTrustRelationship%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

Docs.exception: There is no trust relationship with the specified .
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
is .

Docs.exception: The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DomainMode As DomainMode

Docs.summary: Gets the mode that this domain is operating in.
Docs.value: 值的其中一個，表示這個網域作業所在的模式。
Docs.exception: The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DomainModeLevel As Integer
public: property int DomainModeLevel { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the mode level that this domain is operating in.
Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers() cil managed

Docs.summary: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.
Docs.returns: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由查詢 DNS SRV 記錄，來尋找可探索的網域控制站。 這個方法會傳回只註冊一般、 非特定站台、 網域控制站的 SRV 記錄這些網域控制站。

Docs.exception: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers (siteName As String) As DomainControllerCollection

Docs.param: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.
Docs.summary: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.
Docs.returns: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以藉由查詢 DNS SRV 記錄，來尋找可探索的網域控制站。 如果網域控制站不會註冊指定的站台的 SRV 記錄，它將不會傳回此方法中，即使網域控制站實際上是位於在該站台內。
註冊指定的站台的 SRV 記錄的所有網域控制站會都傳回由這個方法，即使它們並非實際位在該站台內。

Docs.exception: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
is an empty string.
is .
The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetComputerDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetComputerDomain () As Domain

Docs.summary: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.
Docs.returns: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetComputerDomain%2A>方法是<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>物件，表示執行應用程式的電腦已加入網域。 這個傳回值都是獨立的應用程式執行所在的網域認證。 這個方法會擷取電腦的網域，不論下執行的受信任的帳戶網域認證。 若要擷取<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain>物件，表示對應的網域使用者認證作用中應用程式執行所在的安全性內容，請使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain.GetCurrentDomain%2A>方法改為。

Docs.exception: A connection to the domain could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetCurrentDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCurrentDomain () As Domain

Docs.summary: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.
Docs.returns: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取決於應用程式執行所在的網域認證。 若要擷取已加入的物件，表示要執行應用程式之電腦的網域，不論該應用程式相關聯的認證，請使用方法改為。 ## 另請參閱

Docs.exception: A connection to the current context could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseDomainFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode domainMode) cil managed

Docs.param: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.
Docs.summary: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 值可以是引發，但不是會降低。 這表示提高網域功能等級是無法復原，而且若要這樣做決策時務必要謹慎。 如需有關網域操作模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[網域與樹系功能](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp)。 下表定義的有效值`domainMode`根據目前的作業模式的網域。 |目前的模式|模式可以提高至| |------------------|---------------------------| ||



| ||| ||| ||無|

Docs.exception: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Based on the current operating mode of the domain, the value specified for is not valid.
is not a valid enumeration value.
The object has been disposed.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
